articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes U.S. Act of Faulting DPRK's Test Launch of Strategic Missile
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes U.S. Act of Faulting DPRK's Test Launch of Strategic Missile
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday over the fact that the U.S. and its followers are faulting the DPRK's test-launch of strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2:
					 The officials in the field of national defence science and technology and the workers in the munitions field of the DPRK successfully carried out the test-launch of ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 amid continued measures for bolstering the nuclear force of the country.
					
					 As reported, the recent launch was aimed to finally confirm the technical specifications of the overall weaponry system of Pukguksong-2 series and fully examine their adaptability to various combat conditions before their deployment for action.
					
					 This is part of the normal process for bolstering the military capabilities for self-defence and a process that has to be gone through for deployment.
					
					 But the U.S. and its followers again published a UN Security Council press statement peppered with such rhetoric as "sanctions" and "denunciation".
					
					 We flatly reject the press statement taking the advantages of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Nothing favorable can be expected from the U.S. and its followers obsessed by inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the DPRK. But it is absolutely ridiculous to see them finding fault with the DPRK's every measure for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK substantially displayed the capabilities for mounting a nuclear attack at Hawaii housing the U.S. pacific forces command and the Pacific operational theatre including Alaska, and has built full capabilities for attacking the U.S. mainland, the stronghold of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers' despicable act of taking issue with the DPRK's measures for bolstering nuclear force will only result in increasing our hostility to them and furthering the efforts to diversify and modernize our own nuclear force.

articles.title: Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Returns
articles.content:
Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Returns
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 12 Published
articles.content:
"Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 12 Published
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Vol. 12 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published in the DPRK.
					 The four-chapter book carries revolutionary anecdotes made by President Kim Il Sung in the period from August Juche 38 (1949) to June Juche 39 (1950) when he led the drive for carrying out the two-year national economy plan after the liberation of the country and made full preparations to cope with the enemies' surprise war of aggression.
					
					 Chapter 45 carries anecdotes on the stories about the facts that the President laid strong foundation for self-reliant national economy, giving field guidance to various units.
					
					 Chapter 46 carries anecdotes conveying the devoted efforts of the President by energetically leading the struggle for successfully carrying out the first year tasks of the two-year national economy plan, giving on-the-spot guidance to Jagang and North Phyongan provinces.
					
					 Chapter 47 deals with the devoted efforts of the President for successfully training the younger generation into the successors to the revolution. 
					
					 Chapter 48 tells about the Songun exploits the President performed by giving priority to the combat preparations of the People's Army and training the service personnel to be genuine revolutionary soldiers boundlessly faithful to the country and its people.

articles.title: Social Scientific Achievements Made
articles.content:
Social Scientific Achievements Made
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Social Sciences in the DPRK has made a series of achievements.
					 Scholars of the revolutionary historical science and other fields finished scientific references to the eight famous scenes of the Sobaeksu Valley and eight famous scenes of Mt Paektu in close cooperation with officials of relevant units to add glory to the eternal treasures of the DPRK.
					
					 Social economic scientists wrote a number of valuable treatises conducive to increasing the variety and quantity of home-made products.
					
					 Scholars of literature, folklore, linguistics and archaeology have also made achievements in authoring and editing precious books and dictionaries crystallizing the moral and cultural wealth of the Korean nation with a long history spanning five thousand years and in translating national classics and excavating historical remains and relics.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Air Club
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Air Club
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Achievements made by players and coaches of the Pyongyang City Air Club in the DPRK are highly topical among experts and fans.
					 It has been only two years since the organization of the club, but it has won at least 60 medals, including 20 golds, in the events of free flying aero model, engine-propelled aero model and drone aerobatics of different national games like the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize and the national youth championship.
					
					 All the model planes have been made by the club.
					
					 The club has a gym and various training equipment and grounds for aero model flying and skydiving.
					
					 Pyon Jong Ho, head of the club, told KCNA that the club would put the training on a higher scientific basis to produce excellent players.

articles.title: Desire of Kwangju Resistance Fighters Have to be Fulfilled: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Desire of Kwangju Resistance Fighters Have to be Fulfilled: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- It has been 37 years since the Kwangju Popular Uprising in south Korea but independence, democracy and reunification so much wished for by those resistance fighters have not yet come true.
					 The U.S. domination and interference in south Korea have deepened and pro-U.S. fascist forces are still going on the rampage.
					
					 The remnants of the pro-U.S. stooges have gone desperate to evade the responsibility for the Kwangju massacre, while describing the uprising as "riot of insurgents". They even make such anti-DPRK rhetoric about "north's special unit's intervention in the Kwangju incident", inciting north-south confrontation.
					
					 This is a total denial of the patriotic Kwangju Popular Uprising and a desperate bid of the reactionaries of history to bring back the dark fascist era.
					
					 The uprising is remembered by the Koreans as an anti-U.S. and anti-fascist resistance for justice and democracy in which a do-or-die battle was fought for independence, democracy and national reunification against the colonial and military fascist rule by the U.S. imperialists and their stooges.
					
					 The souls of the resistance fighters who laid down their precious lives for the new politics and new social system still cry for a complete end to the lamentable colonial rule by the U.S. imperialists as well as to the pro-U.S. traitors.
					
					 But the pro-U.S. conservatives and descendents of the "yusin" dictatorship serving the U.S., which back-stage manipulated the unprecedented Kwangju Massacre, are still going wild to stamp out the patriotic souls of the martyrs.
					
					 The puppet conservative forces prevented "March for Dear Ones", a song symbolic of the struggle for democracy, from being played at memorial services for the resistance fighters under absurd pretexts of "division of public opinion" and "symbol of the pro-north forces seeking regime change".
					
					 No matter how desperately the group of conservatives may try to distort the truth of history, they can never do away with the souls of the resistance fighters.
					
					 The way for giving vent to the pent-up wrath of the fighters and sincerely consoling their souls is to completely eliminate the pro-U.S. traitorous forces in south Korea and put an end to the colonial domination and rule by the U.S.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life including youth and students should intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S. and conservatives to have the desire of fallen Kwangju fighters fulfilled without fail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Education in Revolutionary Traditions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Education in Revolutionary Traditions
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The importance and significance of education in the revolutionary traditions can never be weakened, though the circumstances and conditions of the revolutionary struggle may change in line with the advance of socialist construction, and the education is an important affair that cannot be stopped even a moment. This is the steadfast creed of the Workers' Party of Korea, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an editorial.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of the WPK comprehensively contain the precious exploits and experience performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the stern revolutionary practice, and their most correct guiding ideas for the revolution, indomitable revolutionary spirit and revolutionary and popular working method and style.
					
					 The revolutionary history of the great leaders is just the history of socialist Korea and the path we should go along.
					
					 The DPRK's history of building a prosperous country is a history in which its people have glorified the revolutionary traditions of Mt Paektu and brought about steady revolutionary upsurge despite the manifold hardships.
					
					 We should effect a new turn in education in the revolutionary traditions and thus hasten the final victory in the building of a socialist power and the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the noble intention of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The prospect of the Korean revolution is very rosy as it has the great revolutionary history and traditions and their inheritance is reliably ensured.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Ideological Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Ideological Work
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- It is truth proven by history that socialism will triumph when priority is given to ideology but will ruin if not, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Citing what happened in Eastern European countries in which socialism collapsed, the article says a step concession in ideological work will precisely lead to ruin and end of socialism.
					
					 The article continues:
					
					 It is foolish to try to achieve the economic growth only while disregarding the ideological work in socialist countries. Today when the imperialists keen on dominating the world are resorting to all sleight of hands to bring down those countries advocating socialism and independence against imperialism, it is as good as pricking one's own eyes to set aside the ideological work.
					
					 The battle between socialism and imperialism is stand-off between mental and ideological power as well as the confrontation between economic and military power.
					
					 The war to defend socialism is an offensive battle to contain the imperialists politically and ideologically and, at the same time, overpower corrupt ideology and culture with revolutionary ideology and culture.
					
					 The more undisguised the enemies become in their moves against socialism, the more firmly one has to give definite precedence to the ideological work. Herein lies a key to advancing the socialist cause to victory and accomplishing it.
					
					 No enemy will be undefeatable, once one is strong in ideology.

articles.title: Minju Joson Reveals True Colors of U.S. as Empire of Evils
articles.content:
Minju Joson Reveals True Colors of U.S. as Empire of Evils
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The president, state and defense secretaries and other heavyweights of the U.S. have asserted that the DPRK poses a serious "threat" to the world and that "provocative" acts of escalating the situation should never be allowed.
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 The U.S. attempt to brand the DPRK as "mastermind of provocation and threat" and the like is no more than sophism to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and cover up the dirty colors of the U.S. as a heinous nuclear war maniac and chieftain of wrecking global peace.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the U.S. to create a favorable condition for its strategy to isolate and stifle the DPRK by demonizing it.
					
					 In fact, the U.S., overconfident of its strength, has no interests in finding a negotiated solution to the issue with the DPRK at all and only seeks to pressure it by force of arms.
					
					 Therefore, it runs the whole gamut of vituperation to label the DPRK as a criminal and rogue regime in human rights and cyber field while putting military threat and economic pressure on it.
					
					 The world clearly knows who is a disturber and wrecker of peace and chieftain of provocation.
					
					 The U.S. can never cover up and justify its true colors as a rogue country and an empire of evils threatening the regional peace and security with aggression and war moves.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Form War Machine
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Form War Machine
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet military warmongers newly formed the joint sea operation headquarters in January, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on May 21.
					 It was reported that the duty of the headquarters is to intensify spy activities on the DPRK and handle military support such as rapid deployment of the U.S. aircraft carriers, nuclear-powered submarines and other strategic assets and supply of war materiel in contingency on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Should No Longer Pursue Sycophancy towards Outsiders
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Should No Longer Pursue Sycophancy towards Outsiders
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- It has been 56 years since traitor Park Chung Hee, the worst-ever fascist tyrant, took power in south Korea through the May 16 military coup at the instigation of the U.S.
					 The "yusin" dictator's power over a decade constituted a crime-woven history characterized by his acts of treachery and sycophancy toward big powers against national reunification.
					
					 For the ten months since his seizure of power, traitor Park instituted evil laws of 2 000 odd kinds including the "anti-communist law" and newly set up or expanded repressive machineries and thus perfected conditions for brutally suppressing the struggle of south Koreans for democracy and reunification.
					
					 The traitor reluctantly inked the July 4 North-South Joint Statement, the keynote of which is the three principles of national reunification, after caving into the pressure from the public at home and abroad. But he soon declared it as his policy to realize "two Koreas", talking rubbish that his regime could never pin hope on that statement.
					
					 He earnestly asked the U.S. to perpetuate its military presence in south Korea, citing "north's threat to invade the south." His regime persisted in escalating confrontation with the DPRK and hyped "anti-communist" racket while buckling down to preparing a war against it.
					
					 No sooner had traitor Park Geun Hye, who inherited her dictatorial father's disposition, seized power than she persisted in opposing the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and pursued "unification of social systems", escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north at the beck and call of her American master only to push the north-south ties to the worst-ever catastrophe.
					
					 Successive rulers of south Korea hell-bent on pursuing sycophancy to outsiders against reunification all regarded the U.S. as their savior but the compatriots in the north as enemy, and ran wild to stifle them.
					
					 The U.S. is the sworn enemy of all Koreans and the enemy common to mankind as it works hard to dominate the world by enslaving the Korean nation and making the Korean peninsula its base for aggression.
					
					 But the successive rulers of south Korea followed it as their master, pursuing confrontation with the compatriots in the north. They are, indeed, the most foolish and pitiful ones who ruined their destiny by themselves.
					
					 History proved that those keen on sycophancy to outsiders and confrontation with the fellow countrymen can never escape miserable end.
					
					 Traitor Park Chung Hee had met miserable death while committing crimes against the nation aspiring after reunification and traitor Park Geun Hye was thrown into the cesspit of history after being cursed and censured by the public.
					
					 Recently, the south Korean regime orchestrated the farce of "phone diplomacy" and "envoy diplomacy" with the U.S. and neighboring countries, asserting "south Korea-U.S. alliance is the backbone of diplomatic and security policies." It even noisily talks about "cooperation in solving the nuclear issue of the north" and "request for constructive role in six-party talks." This is little different from the hostile acts of the former conservative regime.
					
					 If the present south Korean regime truly hopes for mending the north-south relations and achieving national reunification, it should bear in mind that sycophancy to outsiders and confrontation with the compatriots in the north will lead it to ruin. Written by Han Chol Myong.

articles.title: U.S. Plans to Stage Joint Drill of Nuclear Carriers in East Sea of Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Plans to Stage Joint Drill of Nuclear Carriers in East Sea of Korea
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressors are going to stage a large military drill for invading the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea in June with nuclear-powered carriers Carl Vinson and Ronal Reagan involved, according to the south Korean KBS on May 19.
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers are reported to be involved in the drill.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Proper Education of May 18 Popular Resistance
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Proper Education of May 18 Popular Resistance
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Monday carried an editorial calling for proper education of the May 18 popular resistance.
					 The editorial said schools in 15 cities and provinces across south Korea decided to hold memorial services for the May 18 movement for democratization, conduct activities for education around May 18 and other colorful events.
					
					 They also planned to publish teaching materials about the April 19 revolution, the April 3 incident on Jeju Island, the October popular resistance and other major events of south Korea, the editorial noted, and went on:
					
					 In the past the education of the May 18 popular resistance was conducted in some regions, and the preceding conservative regimes slandered, distorted or curtailed the Kwangju uprising.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime in "state-compiled textbooks" for middle and high schools vaguely depicted the truth or curtailed and distorted the truth about the uprising.
					
					 The education of the May 18 popular resistance is necessary for democratization of society.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Britain
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on May 17 posted on its website "Let Us Usher in a New Golden Age of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il", a letter of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and compatriots in Japan on the 60th anniversary of the Association.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Feats Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Russia, Hungary, Nepal, DR Congo, Nigeria and Angola between April 25 and May 11 to mark the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Mikhail Panchenko, chairman of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy who is general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, said the 7th WPK Congress elected Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK, noting that the Korean army and people had made long strides to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of the Party in the period under review.
					
					 Chairman Kamal Prasad Chaulagain and General Secretary Shankarlal Shrestha of the C.C., United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal stressed that Kim Jong Un inheriting the revolutionary idea and cause of the great leaders is further developing the DPRK into an invincible military power with tremendous military strength capable of standing face to face with the U.S. styling itself "the only superpower".
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, said that the 7th WPK Congress was a historic one which demonstrated the unshakable faith and will of the Korean people to hasten the final victory under the guidance of the Supreme Leader.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and other speakers said that the WPK with Kim Jong Un as its chairman is displaying its dignity as a revolutionary party of Juche steering the socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del primer secretario de partido ucraniano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del primer secretario de partido ucraniano
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Ucrania, Petro Nikolayevich Symonenko.
					El texto integro sigue:
					
					Con motivo del primer aniversario de su desempeno del cargo responsable de Presidente del PTC, le felicito en nombre del CC de PCU y en el mio propio expresandole testimonios de respeto profundo y amistad sincera.
					
					Nosotros, los comunistas ucranianos, apoyamos la consecuente posicion de principios del partido y el Estado coreanos que mantiene Vd. en la lucha por garantizar la seguridad del pais, defender y consolidar la independencia politica y socioeconomica.
					
					Formulamos votos por la salud de Vd. y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades al frente del partido y el Estado para la prosperidad del socialismo y la RPDC y el bienestar del heroico pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza totalmente nuevo comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza totalmente nuevo comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea concedida en relacion con que Estados Unidos y sus satelites cuestionan el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico Pukguksong-2, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 23 la siguiente respuesta:
					En medio de que se reportan de manera multiple y sucesiva los eventos anunciadores del incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del pais, los funcionarios de la rama de ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional y los obreros de la industria belica ejecutaron otra vez con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance Pukguksong-2. 
					
					Como ya trascendidos, el objetivo del reciente disparo estuvo en confirmar finalmente las especificaciones tecnicas del sistema de armamento Pukguksong-2 en su conjunto y examinar con suficiencia la posibilidad de su aplicacion en diferentes circunstancias de batalla, de modo que se pudiera emplazarlo en las unidades militares para el combate. 
					
					Esto forma parte del proceso normal para consolidar el poderio de autodefensa nacional, siendo etapa previa al despliegue para el combate. 
					
					Sin embargo, al cabo de cuestionar nuevamente a la RPDC, EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras volvieron a publicar el llamado comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU usando expresiones aburridas como la "sancion" y "condena". 
					
					Rechazamos totalmente el presente comunicado que consuena con los actos hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Es imposible que se escuchen palabras razonables en boca de EE.UU y sus satelites que tienen el veto cronico a la RPDC y estan colmados de la hostilidad. 
					
					Nos mueve a risa cada vez que les vemos acusando nuestras medidas de autodefensa. 
					
					Ya hemos manifestado sustancialmente nuestra capacidad de ataque nuclear sobre toda la zona operacional de EE.UU. en el Pacifico, inclusive Hawai donde se halla la comandancia de fuerzas norteamericanas del Pacifico y Alaska, y estamos en la disposicion de destruir el propio territorio norteamericano, bastion de agresores. 
					
					Cada vez que esas fuerzas hostiles cuestionen nuestras medidas para el aumento de fuerzas armadas nucleares, se multiplicara el odio que nos hara acelerar la diversificacion y el desarrollo en alto nivel de esas fuerzas.

articles.title: Academia de Ciencias Sociales de RPDC logra exitos en sus trabajos
articles.content:
Academia de Ciencias Sociales de RPDC logra exitos en sus trabajos
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Academia de Ciencias Sociales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, base combinada de estudio de ciencias sociales del pais, logro muchos exitos valiosos en sus trabajos.
					Los cientificos de la rama de ciencias de historia revolucionaria y otras ramas argumentaron los datos referentes a las 8 maravillas panoramicas del Valle Sobaeksu y las 8 maravillas del monte Paektu bajo la cooperacion con los funcionarios interesados, contribuyendo asi a la glorificacion de los tesoros nacionales coreanos.
					
					Los cientificos sociales de la rama economica escribieron muchas tesis sobre la economia que ayudan a realizar la produccion apoyandose en los recursos nacionales.
					
					Los otros de los sectores de literatura, folklore, linguistica y arqueologia desarrollan las labores para escribir y compilar los libros y diccionarios que sintetizan las riquezas espirituales y culturales de la nacion coreana que dan a conocer la cultura e historia milenarias, los trabajos para traducir y redactar los libros clasicos nacionales, y los quehaceres para descubrir y argumentar los lugares y vestigios historicos.

articles.title: Club de Aeronautica de la ciudad de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Club de Aeronautica de la ciudad de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los jugadores y entrenadores del Club de Aeronautica de la ciudad de Pyongyang, logran exitos atrayendo la atencion de los especialistas y los aficionados.
					Fundado hace 2 anos, el Club obtuvo casi 60 medallas inclusive mas de 20 de oro en la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Antorcha de Pochonbo, el Campeonato de Jovenes y otras citas deportivas.
					
					El club fabrica con propia cuenta los materiales necesarios al ejercicio inclusive los aeromodelos y acondiciono la sala de calentamiento y el lugar de ejercicios de caida sobre vertice.
					
					Pyon Jong Ho, jefe del club, subrayo la necesidad de mejorar el nivel de ejercicios para formar a muchos jugadores prometedores.
					
					Ahora, los entrenadores y jugadores de club dan acicate a los ejercicios, a fin de hacer aporte al desarrollo de deporte aereo del pais.

articles.title: EE.UU. planea el entrenamiento conjunto de portaaviones
articles.content:
EE.UU. planea el entrenamiento conjunto de portaaviones
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun reporto el dia 19 la cadena surcoreana KBS, los imperialistas norteamericanos planean ejecutar en junio en el Mar Este de Corea un entrenamiento militar de gran envergadura para la agresion a la RPDC.
					De acuerdo con la fuente, tomaran parte en esa maniobra las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares Carl Vinson y Ronald Reagan y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.
